properties.Name: SpecimenMethod
properties.Description:
The method by which the specimen is obtained.

Ex:
- Throat culture
- Fluid specimen
- Needle specimen
- Negative stain
- Ultramicrotome
- Catheter urine culture
- Cheek-scraping
- Mouthwash
- Chewing gum
- Spit-up
- Skin-scraping
- Blood Sample
- Hair Sample
- Skin Sample
- Amniotic Fluid Sample

Columns.Name: SpecimenMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Specimen Method.

Columns.Name: SpecimenMethodName
Columns.Description: The name of a Specimen Method.

Columns.Name: SpecimenMethodDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Specimen Method.
